entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.106.2
entry.content:
• 🔒 Blocked spammy email domains in member signups (#22027) - Sag

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.106.1...v5.106.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.108.1
entry.content:
• 🔒 Blocked spammy email domains in member signups (#22027) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed tags and authors not fitting in the input field (#22052) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed newsletters not rendering in Portal Email Preferences (#22037) - Chris Raible
  • 🐛 Fixed degraded database performance when using the Post Analytics screen (#22031) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.107.2...v5.108.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.108.2
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.
